text:
Panopta | Onsite in Chicago | Full-Time | www.panopta.com Panopta is a SaaS infrastructure monitoring tool for companies to monitor their entire stack - behind the firewall, on-server, and externally. We're profitable, have fun, and like making ourselves better.

Openings: - Senior Developer: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/panoptacom/view/P_AA... - Developer: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/panoptacom/view/P_AA... - Support Eng: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/panoptacom/view/P_AA... - Product Designer: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/panoptacom/view/P_AA...

Tech Stack: Google Cloud, Python, Redis, MySQL, InfluxDB, Vue.js, Celery, Tornado, and Kafka
